entities.name: harry
entities.description: The protagonist of the story, who is trying to dive into a pool and retrieve a sword.

entities.name: horcrux
entities.description: A magical object that has tightened around Harry's neck, constricting his windpipe.

entities.name: water weeds
entities.description: Water plants that Harry initially thinks are constricting his neck, but turns out to be the Horcrux chain.

entities.name: pool
entities.description: A body of water where Harry is trying to dive and retrieve a sword.

entities.name: sword
entities.description: A magical object that Harry is trying to retrieve from the bottom of the pool.

relationships.description: The Horcrux chain has tightened around Harry's neck, constricting his windpipe.
Harry is trying to dive into the pool and retrieve a sword from its bottom.
Harry is trying to retrieve the sword from the bottom of the pool.
